entry.source: 〉 Two demons are talking to each other...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Two demons are talking to each other...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Old demon\0{F87A,-146}{F813,0,221001}Look, I told you before...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,221002}It's a sad accident, but that's the{F801}risk you take with fusion.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Old demon\0{F87A,-146}{F813,0,221001}Look, I told you before...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,221002}It's a sad accident, but that's the{F801}risk you take with fusion.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Old demon\0{F87A,-146}{F813,0,221004}You knew the risks when you signed up{F801}to become a demonoid, right?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Old demon\0{F87A,-146}{F813,0,221004}You knew the risks when you signed up{F801}to become a demonoid, right?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Old demon\0{F87A,-146}{F813,0,221006}No, there's no way to reverse the{F801}process. Give up.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Old demon\0{F87A,-146}{F813,0,221006}No, there's no way to reverse the{F801}process. Give up.{F801}
